channel.title: How do i
channel.description: since nobody helps me under the right section i post here but um how do i change the colors of crowns like i want a mod admin co owner and owner crown how do i do this how do i change the colors of them

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Nope, your wrong because I did it with cache editor. I was able to edit the admin crown with it.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

John459:

[quote]Client side… you go in your sprites find the crown’s and make your own, or change the colors.

Sorry, but wrong. You download Tom’s Cache Editor and change them with that.[/quote]
Your wrong kid. Editing them with a cache editor is a waste of time since it will glitch. The right way is to add custom crowns and then recolor, or make your own.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i

Client side... you go in your sprites find the crown's and make your own, or change the colors.

Sorry, but wrong. You download Tom’s Cache Editor and change them with that.
